payload.description: The kbsc console server unconditionally creates and writes to a console.log file in the repo root. The open_telemetry_log() function in console_local.rs always opens this file on startup. Logging should only be enabled when explicitly requested (e.g., via CONSOLE_LOG_PATH env var or a --log flag), not by default.
payload.title: Telemetry logging to console.log enabled by default in kbsc
